page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Usually the boys play football in the playground especially in the Winter and Autumn, and cricket or rounders in the Summer. When there is snow on the ground children bring large plastic sacks with which to slide down the hill. Another game is British Bulldog. In this game one person who is the 'catcher' stands in the middle of the playground. The rest of the players line up at one end of the playground and then have to run to the other end without being caught by the catcher.If a player gets caught before reaching the other end of the playground he must then help the catcher 'catch' the others. When everyone has been caught the game restarts usually with the first person who was caught being the catcher.
